downloadDescription: Enterprise Single Sign-On 2016 Cumulative Update 1 installation package
detailsSection:
Cumulative Update 1 for Microsoft Enterprise Single Sign-On 2016 contains hotfixes for issues that were fixed after the release of Enterprise Single Sign-On 2016. We recommend that you test the cumulative update before you deploy it in a production environment. This cumulative update (CU) is a rollup update that contains the following items:
  • All previously released hotfixes for Enterprise Single Sign-On 2016.
systemRequirementsSection: These cumulative updates require that Enterprise Single Sign-On 2016 be installed on the system.   These updates can also be applied on top of previous updates.  They are supported on the same operating systems as Enterprise Single Sign-On 2016.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, and click Next.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
